username..{5,20}: Usernames must be between 5 and 20 characters
username.^\\w+$: Usernames can only have numbers and letters

password..{8,20}: Passwords must be between 8 and 20 characters
password.[A-Z]: Passwords must have at least 1 uppercase letter
password.[a-z]: Passwords must have at least 1 lowercase letter
password.[0-9]: Passwords must have at least 1 number
